title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's stone
description: A book about a young guy who finds out he is a wizard and his misadventures at wizarding school along with his friends.

title: Before I fall
description: A high school teenager who lives the same again and again, only to learn an important life lesson

title: The Hunger Games
description: A dystopian world in which young people are asked to compete in a life threatening competition for the rich's entertainment.

title: Ikigai - The Japanese secret to a long and happy life
description: A philosophical book which talks about japanse methods to lead a happy life.

title: As a Man Thinketh
description: This literary essay by James Allen contains practical wisdom which will inspire and help us discover our hidden powers.

title: The Power of Your Subconscious Mind
description: This remarkable book by Dr. Joseph Murphy, one of the pioneering voices of affirmative-thinking, will unlock for you the truly staggering powers of your subconscious mind.

title: The Theory of Everything
description: Seven lectures by the brilliant theoretical physicist have been compiled into this book to try to explain to the common man, the complex problems of mathematics and the theory of existence.

title: Man's Search For Meaning: The classic tribute to hope from the Holocaust
description: Victor Frankl was a leading psychologist in Vienna when he was arrested for being a Jew during the Nazi regime. He survived holocaust and used his experiences to write this book.
